root: ^With all objectives complete, you should make your way towards the exit.
^However, you probably don't have the <color="yellow">MP</color> to reach it.
^To fully restore your MP, press the End Turn button.
^After that, head to your right in order to leave. You can always tell an exit tile apart by its green outline.
^In the future, keep in mind that you'll need the whole crew to reach the exit. Leave no one behind.
